name: eucalypt
description: Reagent compatibale-ish Squint-cljs library with no React. Builds tiny frontends.

scripts.build: npm run demo:build; npm run dist:build
scripts.test: npm run test:compile && vitest run --config src/test/vitest.config.js
scripts.demo:build: cd src/demo && squint compile && vite build && SRC=small.html vite build
